title: Engagement and Belonging Enhancement Strategies in Online Simulation-Based Language Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Language Proficiency and Practical Work Experience
context.additional_context: VR simulation-based language education course conducted in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments, aiming to improve practical application by in-service professionals

learning_goals: Learners perform language tasks with an engagement rate of 80% or higher in a VR simulation environment.
In post-course surveys, over 90% of learners rate 'improved sense of belonging' positively (4 points or higher out of 5).
Formative assessments measure the frequency of learner interactions (5 or more times per week) and feedback utilization rates (70% or higher).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
